attributes.action: Make Ear piercings of Babies and Children  under 10 years old ILLEGAL.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Ear piercing of Babies and young Children Banned with a law that make's it illegal to pierce anyone under the age of 10 . And that anyone over the age of 10 must give there  consent

rejection.details: Please see: Ban piercing of infants too young to give their consent.
